price: Sabõda haka ka yi haƙuri. Lalle wa'adin Allah gaskiya ne. To, kõ dai lalle Mu nũna maka sãshen abin da Muka yi musu wa'adi da shi kõ kuwa lalle Mu karɓi ranka, to, zuwa gare Mu ake mayar da su.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۚ فَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
